languages.text: "Видишь, эттфатер, сколь явно дает нам понять Всеотец, что нити вюрда нашего переплетены особым образом? Не случайно свел он твою и мою дороги, не случайно привел в одно место. Ступай же со мной, когда придет черед отыскать моих братьев".

"See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrds are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."
languages.original_text: "Видишь, эттфатер, сколь явно дает нам понять Всеотец, что нити вюрда нашего переплетены особым образом? Не случайно свел он твою и мою дороги, не случайно привел в одно место. Ступай же со мной, когда придет черед отыскать моих братьев".

traits.locale_text: "See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrd are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿Lo ve, Aett-Vater? El Padre de todas las cosas quiere que sepamos que nuestros destinos están unidos. No fue coincidencia que su camino se cruzara con el mío. No fue coincidencia que acabáramos los dos en un mismo sitio. Por eso, cuando llegue el momento, quiero que me acompañe a buscar a mis hermanos».
languages.original_text: "See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrds are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."

traits.locale_text: «¿Lo ve, Aett-Vater? El Padre de todas las cosas quiere que sepamos que nuestros destinos están unidos. No fue coincidencia que su camino se cruzara con el mío. No fue coincidencia que acabáramos los dos en un mismo sitio. Por eso, cuando llegue el momento, quiero que me acompañe a buscar a mis hermanos».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “看到了吗，狼领？全父想让我们看到，我们的命运是交织在一起的。他把你带到了我的身边，这绝非偶然。所以，等时机成熟之后，跟我一起去寻找我的兄弟们吧。”
languages.original_text: "See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrds are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."

traits.locale_text: “看到了吗，狼领？全父想让我们看到，我们的命运是交织在一起的。他把你带到了我的身边，这绝非偶然。所以，等时机成熟之后，跟我一起去寻找我的兄弟们吧。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ほらな、アエット＝ヴァテル。全知の父は俺たちの世界の糸が絡み合っていることを知ってもらいたいんだ。彼があんたの道と俺の道をひとつに描いたのは、偶然じゃなかったってことだ。俺たちをひとつの場所に導いたのも偶然じゃなかったんだよ。だから俺が兄弟たちを探す時は、一緒に来てくれよな」
languages.original_text: "See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrds are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."

traits.locale_text: 「ほらな、アエット＝ヴァテル。全知の父は俺たちの世界の糸が絡み合っていることを知ってもらいたいんだ。彼があんたの道と俺の道をひとつに描いたのは、偶然じゃなかったってことだ。俺たちをひとつの場所に導いたのも偶然じゃなかったんだよ。だから俺が兄弟たちを探す時は、一緒に来てくれよな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Vous voyez, aett-vater ? Le Père de Tous tient à nous faire savoir que les fils de notre wyrd sont intimement liés. Ce n'est pas par hasard qu'il s'est arrangé pour que nos chemins se croisent. C'est à dessein qu'il nous a conduits l'un et l'autre au même endroit. Je vous invite donc à m'accompagner quand l'heure sera venue d'aller chercher mes frères. »
languages.original_text: "See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrds are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voyez, aett-vater ? Le Père de Tous tient à nous faire savoir que les fils de notre wyrd sont intimement liés. Ce n'est pas par hasard qu'il s'est arrangé pour que nos chemins se croisent. C'est à dessein qu'il nous a conduits l'un et l'autre au même endroit. Je vous invite donc à m'accompagner quand l'heure sera venue d'aller chercher mes frères. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Seht Ihr, Aett-Vater? Der Allvater will uns wissen lassen, dass die Fäden unseres Wyrds miteinander verwoben sind. Es war kein Zufall, dass er Euren Pfad und den meinen zusammengeführt hat. Es war kein Zufall, dass er uns an denselben Ort geführt hat. Also begleitet mich, wenn die Zeit reif ist, nach meinen Brüdern zu suchen."
languages.original_text: "See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrds are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Seht Ihr, Aett-Vater? Der Allvater will uns wissen lassen, dass die Fäden unseres Wyrds miteinander verwoben sind. Es war kein Zufall, dass er Euren Pfad und den meinen zusammengeführt hat. Es war kein Zufall, dass er uns an denselben Ort geführt hat. Also begleitet mich, wenn die Zeit reif ist, nach meinen Brüdern zu suchen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrds are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."

languages.text: "Görüyor musun Aett-Vater? Yücebaba, kader ağlarımızın birlikte örüldüğünü bilmemizi istiyor. İkimizin yolunu kesiştirmesinin bir sebebi var. İkimizi aynı yere yönlendirmesinin bir sebebi var. Vakit geldiğinde benimle kardeşlerimi aramaya gel."
languages.original_text: "See, Aett-Vater? The Allfather wants us to know that the threads of our wyrds are intertwined. It was not by chance that he drew your path and mine together. It was not by chance that he led us to one and the same place. So come with me when the time is right to seek out my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Görüyor musun Aett-Vater? Yücebaba, kader ağlarımızın birlikte örüldüğünü bilmemizi istiyor. İkimizin yolunu kesiştirmesinin bir sebebi vardı. İkimizi aynı yere yönlendirmesinin bir sebebi vardı. Doğru zaman geldiğinde kardeşlerimi aramak için benimle gel."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
